title: Atlas Shrugged
author: Ayn Rand
summary: 'Atlas Shrugged' by Ayn Rand, is a philosophical novel set in a dystopian United States where the most productive individuals are being systematically striked from society by a mysterious force.

title: War and Peace
author: Leo Tolstoy
summary: 'War and Peace' by Leo Tolstoy is a sweeping epic set against the backdrop of the Napoleonic Wars, focusing on the interconnected lives of five aristocratic Russian families.

title: The Seagull
author: Anton Chekhov
summary: 'The Seagull' by Anton Chekhov is a tragicomedy set on a Russian estate where a group of characters grapple with unrequited love, artistic aspirations, and the complexities of human relationships.
